condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: As Ebola ended in June 2016, no Ebola-related activity was conducted in 2017, apart from finishing the reconversion of the 6 former Ebola treatment centers into isolation centers for any new epidemics. The 6 isolation centers received children diagnosed with measles cases during the last outbreak, for adequate treatment. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:14/12/2017
